author: rse
msg: Fix a bug in the calculation of the buffer size for the line continuation
facility in Apache's configuration files which could lead to a buffer overflow

author: rse
msg: Make documentation and error messages of APACI's --activate-module=FILE

author: rse
msg: Fix the gcc version check (for enabling the `inline' facility) to
really support all future gcc versions >= 2.7 until we know more.

author: rse
msg: Let APACI's configure script correctly complain for unknown --enable-XXX

author: rse
msg: Link the shared core bootstrap program (``SHARED_CORE'') also against libap.a
and use it's ap_snprintf() instead of sprintf() to avoid possible buffer
